hymn.title: Our God and Father, we respond anew
hymn.category: Worship of the Father—His Praise from Many Sons

lyrics.stanza: Our God and Father, we respond anew To love in Christ revealed, and praise Thy Name. He did Thy will; and for the joy in view, Endured the cross, despising all the shame.
Chosen in Him Thy well-beloved Son, We have our part in joy before Thy face; Predestined, ere this world had yet begun, For that blest world, where all bespeaks Thy grace.
Sons loved and loving, whom Thy Spirit fills, Our endless portion Christ in us to be; Each with some trait of Him whose love us thrills, For Thy delight and joy eternally.
